summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A RIDE EAZY DOT SLEEK MOTORCYCLE HELMET, SIZE: L. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 18E103000 (EQUIPMENT). THE CONTACT WAS CONCERNED THAT IN THE EVENT OF A HEAD IMPACT, THE HELMET WOULD FAIL TO PROTECT THE WEARER. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 1-410-696-7180 APPROXIMATELY TWO MONTHS AGO. THE CONTACT LEFT THE REQUIRED VOICE MESSAGE FOR A CALL BACK, BUT THERE HAD BEEN NO RESPONSE. THE CONTACT ALSO SENT AN E-MAIL, BUT NO RESPONSE WAS RECEIVED. THE CONTACT FELT THAT A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME HAD PASSED FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
